org.slf4j.impl

Class CasLoggerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.slf4j.impl.CasLoggerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.slf4j.ILoggerFactory

    public final class CasLoggerFactory
extends Object
implements org.slf4j.ILoggerFactory
    An implementation of ILoggerFactory that is looked up via the StaticLoggerBinder of CAS itself. It is responsible for creating Logger instances and passing them back to the slf4j engine.
    Since:
    4.1.0
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CasLoggerFactory()
      Instantiates a new Cas logger factory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(String name)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CasLoggerFactory

        public CasLoggerFactory()
        Instantiates a new Cas logger factory. Configures the reflection scanning engine to be prepared to scan org.slf4j.impl in order to find other available factories.

    • Method Detail

      • getLogger

        public org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(String name)

        Attempts to find the real Logger instance that is doing the heavy lifting and routes the request to an instance of CasDelegatingLogger. The instance is cached by the logger name.

        Specified by:
        getLogger in interface org.slf4j.ILoggerFactory
